# altitude

**Instance Property**

The absolute altitude of the device relative to sea level, measured in meters.

## Declaration

```swift
var altitude: Double { get }
```

## Discussion

This value can be positive or negative.

## Accessing Altitude Data

- **accuracy**: The estimated uncertainty of the altimeter in meters, based on one standard deviation.
- **precision**: The recommended resolution for the altitude, in meters.
